posts.content: I'd def be interested and def if you can sort a welding day for novices. Like others my availability depends on dates re work etc. Thanks for putting this tog. Loz

Hi, Yes I'd be interested but at Red Devil says, as long as previous experience is not required.
Cheers,
im def up for this depending on dates may have a friend who may want to come to
Count me in too, depends on dates but would really love to learn this stuff.

Hi X F1
This sounds like an amazing opportunity to develop top notch metal bashing skills to keep our old babies on the road.

Book me in for an available slot.

Great idea.

Cheers Paul
please send us details and ill be there

On behalf of Rusty Lee, please put his name down too!



Cheers



Andy
I'd be up for this on apparently the 18th day your going to be running?
you can count me in plz,am very interested!

I'm seeing lots of names down so I'm guessing this is full - if you run another? count me in! [or if there is space]

cash on the day or deposit or ?

To keep everyone upto date:

John being the man he is wants to do this as pro as he can so we're having a chat in the next day or so to sort out dates, courses and content.

For those of you that have asked is previous skill a requisit we may have to balance the courses for those who have only done shrinking and stretching at tesco's (carparking blunders) or those that know how a little more!

'Moler' you can be the stand in tutor if John's ill as your work looks very handy! After reading your threads you've made me smile as I've been doing the same jobs on my 61 panel!

Keep watching the post as i'll update it asap!

Cheers Al
Count me in if numbers allow. Will drive up from london if anyone needs a lift??
